linit.c

00001 /*
00002 ** $Id: linit.c,v 1.14.1.1 2007/12/27 13:02:25 roberto Exp $
00003 ** Initialization of libraries for lua.c
00004 ** See Copyright Notice in lua.h
00005 */
00006 
00007 
00008 #define linit_c
00009 #define LUA_LIB
00010 
00011 #include "lua.h"
00012 
00013 #include "lualib.h"
00014 #include "lauxlib.h"
00015 
00016 static const luaL_Reg lualibs[] = {
00017   {"", luaopen_base},
00018   {LUA_LOADLIBNAME, luaopen_package},
00019   {LUA_TABLIBNAME, luaopen_table},
00020   {LUA_IOLIBNAME, luaopen_io},
00021   {LUA_OSLIBNAME, luaopen_os},
00022   {LUA_STRLIBNAME, luaopen_string},
00023   {LUA_MATHLIBNAME, luaopen_math},
00024   {LUA_DBLIBNAME, luaopen_debug},
00025   {NULL, NULL}
00026 };
00027 
00028 
00029 LUALIB_API void luaL_openlibs (lua_State *L) {
00030   const luaL_Reg *lib = lualibs;
00031   for (; lib->func; lib++) {
00032     lua_pushcfunction(L, lib->func);
00033     lua_pushstring(L, lib->name);
00034     lua_call(L, 1, 0);
00035   }
00036 }
